hints.content: Let's try each strategy one at a time to see if they work.

Add $48+40$ then subtract $1$.

>$\begin{align}\greenD{48}+\purpleC{39}&=\greenD{48}+\purpleC{40}-\purpleC{1}\\
\end{align}$

>Yes, this strategy works.

Add $48+2$ then add $37$.

>$\begin{align}\greenD{48}+\purpleC{39}&=\greenD{48}+(\purpleC{2}+\purpleC{37})\\
&= (\greenD{48}+\purpleC{2})+\purpleC{37}\\
\end{align}$

>Yes, this strategy works.

**The following strategies can be used to add $48+39$.**

- Add $48+40$ then subtract $1$.

- Add $48+2$ then add $37$.
